mapper.update:
update payment_order
pay_no = #{payNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_no = #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_price = #{orderPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_amount = #{amountMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
trade_type = #{tradeType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_at = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_at = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pay_channel = #{payChannel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
out_account = #{outAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
in_account = #{inAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
draw_user_id = #{drawUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_name = #{payName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refund_rejected = #{refundRejected,jdbcType=INTEGER},
weixin_mch_id = #{weixinMchId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ali_seller_id = #{aliSellerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wechat_mch_id = #{wechatMchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ry_mch_id = #{ryMchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ry_app_id = #{ryAppId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source = #{source,jdbcType=TINYINT},

pay_scene = #{payScene,jdbcType=TINYINT} ,
tianyi_pay_id = #{tianyiPayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
attach = #{attach,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update payment_order
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
end_at = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where pay_no = #{payNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update payment_order set pay_no = #{payNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, set order_no = #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, set order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, set order_price = #{orderPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_amount = #{amountMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trade_type = #{tradeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_at = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_at = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_channel = #{payChannel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, out_account = #{outAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_account = #{inAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_title =#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, draw_user_id =#{drawUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_name =#{payName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, batch_no =#{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refund_rejected =#{refundRejected,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql:
and status is not null
and pay_no like CONCAT('%',#{payNo},'%')
and order_no like CONCAT('%',#{orderNum},'%')
and status like CONCAT('%',#{status},'%')
and trade_type like CONCAT('%',#{tradeType},'%')
